content.raw:
This is working great! I have a few suggestions on pull request #155.

It's not clear to me yet how we'll integrate other plugins with this, but we can leave this for future PRs. I think we can always copy this plugin's code to ign-gazebo and the logic to populate the scene directly to it.
content.html:
This is working great! I have a few suggestions on pull request #155.

It's not clear to me yet how we'll integrate other plugins with this, but we can leave this for future PRs. I think we can always copy this plugin's code to ign-gazebo and the logic to populate the scene directly to it.
